Text.Page:
Have you seen the {@LinkCreature:40#33#zompori miners} that work for the Legion of Thulsa? What happened to them? Do you think the ore they're digging could be affecting the miners?

Are you willing to help me find out? You may have to kill some of them to find samples of the ore.
I'll give these to the Mysterium experts to analyze. Between you and me, I don't want to handle them any longer than I have to.
I'm just a centurion, but I can put two and two together and get mines plus magic stones. Did you find any of those minerals yet?
